title: Destructive Combat Robot
description: Destructive Combat Robot sound pack is an intense collection of audio effects specifically designed to enhance the immersive experience of combat scenarios involving powerful, menacing robots.
longDescription:
Preview;

https://youtu.be/k4wwHAfa9Bo


This pack includes a wide range of high-quality sound effects that capture the destructive and aggressive nature of combat robots, such as heavy mechanical footsteps, metallic impacts and collisions, hydraulic movements and powerful energy weapon blasts,. Each sound effect is carefully crafted to provide a realistic and impactful audio backdrop for video games, films, animations, or any other multimedia project that requires the presence of fearsome combat robots engaged in intense battles.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  41 Mechanical Glitch Elements
  •  9 Robot Footstep sounds
  •  15 Debris related sound files
  • 13 Mechanical robot motion elements
  • 10 Modern shotgun sound files
  • 10 Power Up/Down elements
  • 14 UI (User Interface) sounds
  • 4 Sci Fi ambiences


Number of Audio Waves: 116

Number of Audio Cues: 116

Sample rate / bit rate: 24 bits 48Khz

Do Sound FX loop: Ambiences loop seamlessly

Minutes of audio provided: 7

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
